name: Dread the Dead
description:
(Currently not finished, will add more over time)

WASD-move, SPACE to shoot, E to restart

Collect bullets, food, coffee, and find buildings, all while fighting off the endless hordes of zombies. Will you survive, or become one with the dead.

When your sleep bar is at zero, and you pass out outside a building, it will simply take longer and fill less of the bar. No negative repercussions will happen beyond that.
